#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<math.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<assert.h>
#define pii pair<int,int>
#define IN(A, B, C)  ((B) <= (A) && (A) <= (C))
#define AIN(A, B, C) assert(IN(A, B, C))

using namespace std;
int main(){
 long long int l,r,a,b,i,j;
int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--){
    cin>>l>>r;
    a=l;
    while(a<r){
        b=(a+1)|a;
        if(b<=r) a=b;
        else break;
    }
    cout<<a<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
